about.subtitle: <1>Full Stack</1> Developer Exploring the universe of <2>web development.</2>
about.passion: I am passionate about technology and motivated by the desire to turn ideas into real solutions. I seek to unite logic, creativity, and purpose in each project, applying good practices and always learning something new along the way.
about.journey1: My journey in technology began before graduating in <0>Information Systems</0> (2010). Since then, I have worked for over a decade in large companies such as <2>Scopus Tecnologia (Bradesco)</2> and  <1>Proxxi Tecnologia (IBMÂ®)</1> and , where I developed values such as responsibility, precision, and teamwork. These experiences shaped my way of thinking and taught me that excellence and continuous learning are the way to evolve.
about.journey2: After years in the <1>infrastructure</1> area, I decided to follow a new direction: <2>Web Development</2>. Today, I dedicate myself to creating modern and functional applications, always seeking to improve my skills and keep up with industry trends.
about.goals: My goal is to consolidate my role as a <1>Full Stack</1> developer, participating in projects that stimulate my technical and creative capacity. I like to see the result of my work come to life and impact people, so every challenge is an opportunity to learn, evolve, and generate value through technology.
